Class OrderController

java.lang.Object
com.cafe.backend.controller.OrderController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/orders") public class OrderController extends Object
The OrderController serves as the RESTful API entry point for managing orders.

This controller handles HTTP requests from the frontend and interacts with the service layer to perform CRUD operations on OrderDTO objects, including filtering by status and user.

It supports creation, retrieval, update, and status management of orders in the system.

  • Method Details

    • getAllOrders

      @GetMapping @ResponseStatus(code=OK) public List<OrderDTO> getAllOrders() throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Retrieves all orders in the system.
      Returns:
      A list of OrderDTO objects representing all orders.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no orders are found.
      BadRequestException - if a request error occurs.

    • getOrdersByStatus

      @GetMapping("/status") @ResponseStatus(code=OK) public List<OrderDTO> getOrdersByStatus(@RequestParam("status") OrderStatusEnum status) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Retrieves orders by their status.
      Parameters:
      status - The OrderStatusEnum to filter orders by.
      Returns:
      A list of orders matching the provided status.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no orders are found with the given status.
      BadRequestException - if the provided status is invalid.

    • getOrderById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(code=OK) public OrderDTO getOrderById(@PathVariable("id") Long id) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Retrieves a single order by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The matching OrderDTO.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if no order is found with the given ID.
      BadRequestException - if the provided ID is invalid.

    • createOrder

      @PostMapping @ResponseStatus(code=CREATED) public OrderDTO createOrder(@RequestBody OrderDTO orderDTO) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Creates a new order.
      Parameters:
      orderDTO - The order data to be created.
      Returns:
      The created OrderDTO.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if related entities are missing.
      BadRequestException - if the input is invalid.

    • updateOrder

      @PutMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public OrderDTO updateOrder(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody OrderDTO orderDTO) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Updates an existing order by its ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order to be updated.
      orderDTO - The updated order data.
      Returns:
      The updated OrderDTO.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the order does not exist.
      BadRequestException - if the input is invalid.

    • updateOrderStatus

      @PutMapping("/status/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public OrderDTO updateOrderStatus(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody OrderStatusDTO orderStatusEnum) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Updates the status of a specific order.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the order whose status is to be updated.
      orderStatusEnum - The new status wrapped in a OrderStatusDTO.
      Returns:
      The updated OrderDTO with the new status.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the order is not found.
      BadRequestException - if the status is invalid.

    • getOrdersByUserId

      @GetMapping("/user/{userId}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public List<OrderDTO> getOrdersByUserId(@PathVariable("userId") Long id) throws NotFoundException, BadRequestException
      Retrieves all orders placed by a specific user.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the user.
      Returns:
      A list of orders associated with the user.
      Throws:
      NotFoundException - if the user or their orders are not found.
      BadRequestException - if the user ID is invalid.
